call_control_ids.description: List of unique identifiers and tokens for controlling the call. When empty all participants will be placed on hold.

audio_url.description: The URL of a file to be played to the participants when they are put on hold. media_name and audio_url cannot be used together in one request.

media_name.description: The media_name of a file to be played to the participants when they are put on hold. The media_name must point to a file previously uploaded to api.telnyx.com/v2/media by the same user/organization. The file must either be a WAV or MP3 file.
